TopicTitle: The Story of Bill Kerman - An Emotional KSP Video

Articles.Content: I spent a lot of time on this one. I hope you guys like it! Fullscreen recommended where possible.

I. Am. Simply. AMAZED!!!!!

It\'s one of the most awesome videos I saw bro ;D. The music fitted very very well, the story itself was epic.

You need to do more of this!! I\'d be happy to watch what happens next .

...What a sad ending though :\'( (Sorry if this is spoilers for some people)
Well done! I enjoyed it immensely. Nicely shot, and stirring music too.
Very cool!! Thanks for sharing!

Event_Horizon5, you could show that in theaters and charge ticket money for it.

Just as a suggestion, how about after he lands, he looks back at Kerbin and is excited he made it up there at last? Give it an emotional payoff and a happy ending?

That was pretty amazing!! how about shooting part 2?

By the way moral of the story is: add RCS on your lander
That was nicely done! I liked it
Thanks guys! I realize now that I should have been Kerman, not Kermin. Crap. I guess it\'s too late to change it

Is that From the Earth to the Moon soundtrack? Nice job!

I should really get back into movie making myself.
GREAT ! I really love it, even if the end almost made me cry What about part 2, where intrepid Jeb comes to rescue him (and is succesfull) ?

Yeah, I almost cried as well. However, I acted like Kirk and

http://files.sharenator.com/funny_celebrity_pictures_swallow_sadness_like_a_boss_Meme_base_13-s500x372-156544-580.jpg
I love it! ;D

Pure poetry! :\'(

You need to make a sequel. In a different tone though, make it an epic rescue!
Beautiful.

You guys almost cried at the end? Wow, I didn\'t realize the video had that much of an impact! I\'m glad it managed to tug on your heartstrings.

And you better believe there will be a sequel. I never leave a kerbal behind!

Well done! I liked the camera angles and composition. The clips were timed perfectly, and kept up a brisk pace. It goes by fast, but I can appreciate how so many hours must have been spent to make this.

Thank you!

Honestly I wasn\'t sure if I wanted the landing to be a success or a failure. I settled on failure because that seems to be the road less traveled in these sorts of videos. That said, do you think the crash is too silly looking in the context of the rest of the video? It was the least absurd of about 20 attempts...
I think it was 100% perfectly done. Very good job
Great job, very well done!
Very nice video, i think it should be the next video on the main site !
For Bill\'s sake, I hope there\'s gonna be a sequel.
Don\'t worry. I would never leave Bill behind!

Have my own tragedy.

Bill, Bob and Jeb on Minmus.....

Thank you!

Honestly I wasn\'t sure if I wanted the landing to be a success or a failure. I settled on failure because that seems to be the road less traveled in these sorts of videos. That said, do you think the crash is too silly looking in the context of the rest of the video? It was the least absurd of about 20 attempts...

I like it, it has a Murphy\'s Law element to it. After all that, going so far...

...the engine falls off at the end.

Wow! Best movie I have seen! Nice music!

I know how Bill felt... Happens to my all the time with my Bill.
